DOC.brief_summary: This study aim understand impact time-of-the day human myocardial tolerance ischemia-reperfusion explore atrial myocardium biopsied cardiac surgery . Patients schedule non-urgent cardiac surgery ( coronary artery by-pas graft and/or aortic valve replacement ) assign morning afternoon cardiac surgery base randomization . Myocardial biopsy explore ex vivo condition mimic ischemia-reperfusion .
DOC.criteria: Patient schedule coronary artery bypass graft surgery and/or aortic valve replacement extracorporeal circulation Patient sinus rhythm time surgery Patient old 18 Patient able understand information consent form Medical history type 2 diabetes , atrial fibrillation use class III antiarhythmic drug leave ventricle ejection fraction < 40 % Pregnancy Patient emergency condition
